channel.title: Programming kata on Guowei Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Programming kata on Guowei Lv

item.title: Programming Kata
item.description: From today, I will practice one programming kata per day and post the content here. Here goes the first one: My friend John likes to go to the cinema. He can choose between system A and system B. System A : buy a ticket (15 dollars) every time System B : buy a card (500 dollars) and every time buy a ticket the price of which is 0.90 times the price he paid for the previous one.
